post:
Time to check your backups, boys and girls. With the recent fire at OVH and the occasional provider deadpool, it's just good practice.

To celebrate World Backup Day, [BorgBase.com](https://www.borgbase.com "BorgBase.com"), is offering 15% off on all standard plans. Just use code **WBAD21** during checkout.

BorgBase offers simple and secure offsite backup storage based on Borg Backup:
- Encrypted locally with your own key
- Every repository is isolated
- Prevent compromised backups with append-only mode
- Compression and deduplication to reduce space usage and transfers
- Alerts on Missed Backups (email, Pushover, webhooks)
- EU and US region available

Available plans: (prices after discount)
* Small Plan, 100 GB: $20.4/year
* Medium Plan, 1 TB: $68/year
* Large Plan, 2 TB: $127.5/year

All plans come with a flexible quota you can use as needed for peak usage. We can also offer custom plans or managed servers for even greater storage needs.

We are also strong believers in open source and currently maintain the following projects for the benefit of everyone (they work with any backup storage):
- [Vorta](https://vorta.borgbase.com "Vorta"), a backup client for macOS and Linux desktops. (recently [included](https://packages.debian.org/sid/vorta "included") in Debian 🎉)
- [Ansible role](https://github.com/borgbase/ansible-role-borgbackup "Ansible role") to setup Borg+Borgmatic on most server systems
